title: Full Stack Web Developer
description:
I have worked with clients to understand their business needs and developed custom web solutions to meet those needs.
I worked on a full range of web development tasks, including frontend, backend, deployment, support, and search engine optimization.
I have worked with numerous companies over the years.

title: Full Stack Web Developer
description:
In 2007, I joined a small brick-and-mortar plumbing store that had only three employees.
We were able to grow the business and become one of the top three Russian online plumbing stores within four years.
I played a crucial role in this growth by building the online store from scratch, without relying on any frameworks.

title: Full Stack Web Developer
description: II have worked as a web developer in a small family business. I was responsible for our company website and played a significant role in its growth. As a result of my efforts, the business was successfully sold in 2006.
